mapper.select: select lesseeContractID as contactnoID, companyID, contractNumber as contactno, contractStartDate as contractStrat, contractEndDate as contractEnd, contractOfCopy as copyOfContract, dealPrice as price, contractStatus as contactnoStatus from t_lesseeContract2 limit #{param1},#{param2};

select c.carAddress as carPlace, c.carNumber as carNumber, l.contractNumber as Contactno, l.contractStartDate as contractStrat, l.contractEndDate as contractEnd from t_cbdCarLease2 z, t_cbdCar2 c,t_lesseeContract2 l where z.cbdCarID=c.cbdCarID and z.lesseeContractID=l.lesseeContractID and l.lesseeContractID=#{param1} limit #{param2},#{param3}
select carAddress carPlace, carNumber from t_cbdCar2 where leaseStatus=#{param1} limit #{param2},#{param3}
select count(*) as nums,sum(expenditure) as expendAll,sum(income) as incomeAll from t_bill
select companyID, loginName as logName, loginPwd as logPass, companyName, floor as companyFloor, linkman linkMan, linkPhone from t_company2 where companyID=#{id} ;
